{{category.name}}
(eventt) = "currentCategory" import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import {Product, products} from '../products' export interface category{ name: string; } export const categories = [ { name : 'Phones' }, { name : 'PC' } ] @Component({ selector: 'app-category', templateUrl: './category.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category.component.css'] }) export class CategoryComponent { productList : Product[] = [] constructor(){ } categories = [...categories] currentCategory :String ="" getValue(buttonValue: string) { this.currentCategory = buttonValue } // categoryy(){ // for (let i =0; i
